title: Interpretation of seeing Surah Q in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: He mentioned that this vision is one of the good news in the generality of his observations, as it foretells a lot of happiness and eternal bliss. The fortune teller tells that the situation is improving and that what is desired will be achieved and that the coming period will witness many good changes that will please its owner. It also indicates the state of my opinions with his Lord, and that he is one of those chosen by God to get closer to Him. If God loves a servant and allows him to obey Him, then congratulations to him. The owner of this vision is a good omen for what will come of good. Then it indicates diligence in the opinion in the work that will lead to his promotion and reaching a prestigious position at work. Surah Q in a dream indicates that he will enjoy a new job that will soon replace the job he lost. What is the interpretation of seeing someone reciting Surah S in a dream? An indication of abundant nutrition. What does a married woman mean by seeing the letter S in her dream? Evidence of getting rid of problems and worries. What does Surah S indicate in a pregnant woman’s dream? It indicates an easy birth and enjoyment of health and well-being. What is the vision of Surah Q for someone who lost his job? It symbolizes that God will compensate him with a prestigious job. Whoever sees in a dream He reads Surat S. Dreaming of someone reciting Surat Q in a dream is a sign of bringing a lot of sustenance. It indicates an abundance of sustenance, ease after hardship, and comfort after hardship, as it tells its owner that he must approach God so that he can be given. It also indicates the perfection of morals and a good reputation in the society in which the viewer lives. It tells us that the viewer will have more stability and peace of mind in the coming period of his real life and that the crises he faced have ended. It also tells its owner that he is on the path of truth, so he must adhere to what God has given him from righteous approach to God and complete contemplation of His verses. Interpretation of seeing Surat S in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing Surat Q in a dream for a pregnant woman heralds good and gives her good news that her pregnancy period will pass in complete health and wellness. It says that her due date has come and she will give birth easily and easily without facing problems or health problems. Good news for her that God will give her the newborn in health, and it will be a male, God willing, so praise be to God. Surat S in a dream also has blessings that indicate the end of marital problems and the stability of the relationship between her and her husband after tension Long. It is mentioned that Surat Qaf has blessings that open the doors of livelihood and it is also one of the good tidings that accompany him from the severity of the torment of death and protect him from the temptations of the grave. Interpretation of the letter Q in a dream The letter Q in a dream indicates many positive changes that will happen to the dreamer during the coming period of his real life and will be good for the course of his life. Seeing a married woman with the letter Q in her dream indicates the psychological calm that the dreamer enjoys as a result of getting rid of all the crises he faced in the previous period. It is also an indication of an improvement in the husband's financial conditions and receiving more money as a result of profit in trade or promotion at work. It indicates in the content of its meanings that it is a sign of achieving what is hoped for and achieving ambitions and aspirations for academic excellence. It heralds the unmarried woman that her marriage contract is close to

title: Interpretation of white pulp in a dream

preview.html: But in our conversation today, we will talk about seeing the white pulp, and whether the person eats it, peels it, etc. All this and more we will move on to in our conversation today from our website gptafser.com/, follow along with us. Interpretation of seeing white pulp in a dream for a girl One, if the unmarried woman was going through some difficult psychological circumstances and saw in a dream that she was eating the white pulp in a dream. It seems that the vision got rid of these conditions that she was going through in her life. But if the unmarried woman saw what he said about peeling the white pulp without eating it in the dream. The vision indicated that he was pursuing any goals he wanted and that he was trying to achieve, and that was thanks to God Almighty. However, if an unmarried girl sees that she is giving the white pulp to an unknown person that she does not know in the dream, the vision indicates that she will share with this person in some personal matters related to his life. If an unmarried girl sees that she is distributing white pulp to people in a dream, this is an indication of the presence of many happy events that will come soon, God willing. Seeing herself eating pulp and peel in a dream may symbolize an unmarried girl who has certain problems that hinder some things in her. And God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing white pulp in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing white pulp in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees white pulp in a dream, this can lead to some of the following problems. Seeing white pulp husk in a married woman’s dream. It may It means that he is facing some problems that he faces in reality, and God Almighty is high. Or if a married woman sees that her husband is giving her the white pulp in a dream. This may mean that there is an exciting partnership between the two parties. But if the married woman sees that she is holding the husk of the white pulp in a dream. She will be hiding some of her own secrets or trying to deal with some family problems. Eating white pulp with the family and children in a married woman’s dream. It indicates family happiness experienced by both parties and can indicate family stability and tranquility. The vision of receiving pulp from the husband can be interpreted, and it may She was happy with him in the dream. The vision indicated planning for some of the problems and obstacles that the couple is going through and working to create or create a spirit of cooperation. Interpretation of seeing white pulp in a dream about the man and its meaning. Seeing a married man eating porridge in a dream means many, many symbols. Among them is seeing pulp. White scattered on the ground in a married man’s dream. It indicates the presence of some family problems with insight, and God Almighty knows best. But if a married man eats porridge with his wife in a dream. The vision showed participation in all life issues that both parties are going through. It could be a sign of cooperation. In matters related to life in general for both parties. We may see the interpretation of seeing white pulp on the hand of a married man in a dream. It is an indication that there are many wrong decisions made by the dreamer in reality, and God Almighty knows best. It may symbolize the vision of eating white pulp.

title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage in a drunk person’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a drunken marriage in a dream They do not interpret it, but rather the interpretations of some scholars from the heart Interpretation of a dream about a drunken marriage In the event that he sees a drunken husband in a dream, this may indicate his indifference to the great responsibilities that fall on his shoulders, and God knows best. And the dream of a husband being drunk in a dream may indicate the arrogance of the blessings that were in his life at that time, and God knows best. If a woman sees that her husband was drunk, this may indicate illegitimate material gains that the wife can obtain during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an angry husband in a dream The dream of a husband being angry with his wife in a dream may indicate the intense love that exists between them at that moment. If the husband is angry with his wife in a dream, this may indicate the mutual trust between the spouses during these days. The dream of a husband being angry with his wife in a dream may indicate the psychological accumulation and tensions that occur between them and they need to seek God’s help. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband was angry with her, it may indicate his great trust in her at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the wedding of my friend who flirts with me in a dream If I see my friend’s husband flirting with me in The dream, it may indicate that this is stored in the false mind and that she must repent to God Almighty. Seeing a friend's husband flirting with a woman in a dream may indicate the good that will come her way during that period. It is possible that seeing a friend's husband flirting with a woman in a dream indicates that the woman is very close to her friend during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of my husband divorcing me three times in a dream If a woman sees that her husband has divorced her three times in a dream, this may indicate a trip that the husband may suddenly take in those days, and God knows best. Perhaps seeing his wife divorced three times in a dream indicates some changes occurring between them, and this instinct, and God knows best. In the case of dreaming of marriage, a woman's divorce three times in a dream, it may indicate after the changes that occur in her life in those days, and God knows best. It is possible to see a husband divorcing his wife three times in a dream, this may indicate a financial crisis that they are suffering from and that they will be freed from it in the coming period, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of the husband's death and not crying over him in a dream In the event that a person sees the death of the husband and does not cry over him in a dream, this may indicate the husband's neglect of his wife a lot during that period, and God knows best. In the event that a woman sees that her husband Dying and she did not cry over him in the dream, this could be a warning sign that she is on the wrong path and that she should be very careful about the house at that time. . In the event that one sees the death of the husband and does not cry over him in the dream, this could mean that the husband is traveling far and away from his family for a long time. Seeing the death of the husband and not crying over him in the dream may indicate the psychological pressure that the woman is suffering from at that time and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife’s house burning in a dream In the event that a woman sees that her ex-husband’s house is burning, it could mean that the husband is traveling far and away from his family for a long time. Seeing the death of the husband and not crying over him in the dream could indicate the psychological pressure that the woman is suffering from at that time and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife’s house burning in a dream In the event that a woman sees that her ex-husband’s house is burning, it could mean that the husband is traveling far and away from his family for a long time.

title: Interpretation of jumping and jumping in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of jumping and jumping in a dream Jumping and jumping are fun things and games that many people like to play, but is there an interpretation of seeing jumping and jumping in a dream? We will learn about it in this article, so follow us. Interpretation of jumping and jumping in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: If a person dreams that he is jumping on one leg because of an injury to his other leg, this is evidence of fatigue and unhappiness in his life. But if a person sees that he is jumping on one of his legs And the other was intact, then this is evidence of strength and victory over enemies. And whoever sees himself jumping from one place to another, this is evidence of a change in his situation to a better one that can change his social or emotional state. And if a person sees in a dream that he is jumping from the ground to the sky, then this Evidence that he will travel and obtain a lot of goods and food. Interpretation of jumping in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is jumping from the window of the house or from the roof of the house, this is evidence of her desire to get rid of her single life and wants to leave her family. Home and moving to a new stage in her life. Interpretation of jumping in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is jumping from something, this indicates that she feels upset and wants to change her lifestyle. Seeing jumping in a dream for a married woman may mean that she does not approve of mistreatment. The husband and she wants to get rid of this treatment. Interpretation of jumping in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she is jumping from above on something, this indicates that she is worried and stressed about the circumstances she is going through during pregnancy. This vision can indicate her next birthday. Interpretation of jumping In a dream for a man: If a man dreams that he is jumping from one high point to another low, this indicates that he is hesitant to do something. But if a man sees in a dream that he is jumping from one low place to another, then this is a sign of the successes that he will achieve in the near future. Interpretation of a dream Jumping on the ground: If one sees himself jumping on the ground, this is a sign that he will leave the place in which he lives. If one sees that he is jumping on the ground with his right foot, this indicates that the person prefers the future to the world. But if he jumps with his left leg, this is evidence of distraction. He is distracted from the pleasures of this world, and does not consider the afterlife. Whoever sees that he was running and then jumped on the ground, this is evidence that he does not agree with anything and does not feel comfortable anywhere. If a person sees in a dream that he is jumping high and dangling in the sky, this is evidence of a high status. In which the dreamer will be.Interpretation of a dream about jumping into waterIf one sees in a dream that he is jumping into water and that the water is impure, then you have evidence of the fears and sorrows that the person will experience in his life. If one sees that he is jumping into a pond and floating in it without fear, this is a sign that the dreamer He will face problems that he will encounter easily. However, if a person sees that he is jumping into a pool and cannot swim in it, this indicates that there are problems in the dreamer’s life and he cannot escape from them.

title: Interpretation of insult in a dream

preview.html: Insult, humiliation, dreaming of someone insulting me, someone insulting you, insulting your lover, insulting a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman and many others by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about insulting Miller This is a bad dream. The dreamer will certainly shed tears and cry. If a girl dreams that she is insulted, this means that a hostile person will take advantage of her ignorance to put her in a suspicious situation with a stranger or endanger her interests with a friend. Interpretation of insult in a dream Being insulted in a dream by a person or group of people is a feeling or emotion that imitates reality, meaning Another, whoever sees in his dream that he is being insulted in reality could be insulted if he does not do so. Take appropriate action. People who constantly dream of being insulted may suffer from social anxiety disorder, which is a type of psychological disorder that can occur when a person speaks in front of a group of people who feel anxious and afraid or when they feel as if they are in focus where he is afraid to appear. Signs of shyness cause him embarrassment, such as stuttering tongue, confusion, and trembling hands. These people often see in their dreams that they are being insulted and ridiculed by their colleagues at work or school and the main reason for this is due to poor self-confidence. The second reason that can make the dreamer fall into a humiliating situation in the dream is the inability to communicate with the social environment, family, The neighborhood he lives in, his workplace, his school, his university, etc. ...Limited social intelligence and the inability to adapt to complex social relationships can be an important factor that causes people to submit in their dreams to humiliation, contempt, and contempt. As for the third factor that can make us vulnerable to humiliation in our dreams, it is the compatibility between dream and reality, where it works The unconscious during sleep to evoke and restore some states of wakefulness. For example, if the dreamer in the waking state steals something from his father, his subconscious mind will reprimand him during the sleep period, so he sees in his dream as if his father scolded him in front of his brothers or neighbors. Insult in one dream An unmarried girl in her dream may be insulted by A friend or colleague. As for the reasons for this dream, they are many, some of which are psychological and some are social, and sometimes insult in the dream is interpreted as the opposite of that, that is, honor or glorification. A story worthy of this chapter. One of the girls saw in her dream that she was preventing a happy wedding, and perhaps it was the wedding of one of her relatives and her silver ring was stolen. , which I wore to that wedding. I felt very embarrassed in front of my relatives, especially my fiancé’s sister, who was sitting between us. The girl adds: The truth is that this ring is mine and my mother gave it to me about two years ago, and I do not understand why my cousin did this and why she deliberately insulted me in this way. (The dream ends) Interpretation: When she read this message, she asked the dreamer for some clarifications about her relationship with her cousin, whom she saw in the dream as if he was scolding her. She replied that it was okay

title: Interpretation of the dream of exposing the nakedness of an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin and senior scholars

title: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Here, dear reader, is the detailed interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream, as visions differ in the associations and meanings they carry, while some believe that dreams are dreams, while the other group believes that they are what inspired Abraham. To slaughter his son, Ismail, peace be upon him. Which God Almighty redeemed with a large ram to become one of the most important religious rituals followed by Muslims in different parts of the world, especially since seeing a girl in a dream is what pleases the heart and eyes, and on the contrary, an ugly girl in a dream disturbs the fortune teller, so what is the symbol that indicates seeing a beautiful girl in a dream? An encyclopedia accompanies you on a tour to decode this dream through what came in the most famous books in dream interpretation, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream Because the girl is a symbol of life, goodness and happiness if she comes with a beautiful and soft body, dream interpretation scholars interpreted seeing a beautiful girl in a dream with different interpretations that entered the dream interpretation book of the scholar Ibn Sirin, and in it we consider in the following lines: Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will enjoy all the good things and abundance in his life. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream means that the absent will return safely to his relatives. A dream about a beautiful girl kissing the dreamer kisses the end of the period of sadness he is living, and it also indicates that the dreamer will spend a period of joy and fun in a unique experience. A beautiful girl in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will be blessed with good offspring, an abundance of sustenance and many good things. Dreaming of a girl with beautiful and delicate features indicates the good condition of the dreamer, as well as the abundance of money that God gives him, and God knows best. Seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in a dream means that the dreamer will soon achieve all the wishes he has always dreamed of in his life, in addition to hearing good news And happy in his life. The priest's dream indicates that a beautiful virgin wears the legal veil. To visit the Sacred House of God and draw closer to God by practicing His rituals that He imposed on Muslims, and God knows best. Interpretation of a beautiful girl in a single dream Every girl is interested in knowing the meaning of her vision. As she may expect a travel date or an approaching wedding date, and she must explain her vision to the beautiful girl, as well as the interpretations, my dear: Seeing a beautiful girl in a single dream symbolizes that the person is proposing to marry her and is characterized by good morals and satisfaction with him. Seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in a single dream indicates marriage to a good person with high morals. As for seeing a beautiful sick girl in a dream. It does not make a good omen. Is it the one that indicates a bad emotional relationship that an unmarried woman enters into, especially if she sees that the girl has left? It symbolizes her engagement to a person who is not suitable for her, so she must seek the help of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a married woman Here, my dear, are the interpretations that came from seeing a beautiful girl in a dream, and among the most prominent of these connections that she carries, and the following came to her: Seeing the neck of a beautiful girl in a dream symbolizes. To the stability and happy married life you dream of. Seeing a beautiful girl

title: Interpretation of a dream about preparing food for guests. The correct comprehensive interpretations

preview.html: Through this article, we will explain to you in detail the interpretation of a dream about preparing food for guests. The dreamer sees in a dream many ambiguous and ambiguous dreams for which he cannot find an explanation, such as a dream about guests who may be known or unknown. In a dream, the dreamer may see them on different occasions for each of them. Various interpretation including preparing food for them. The dreamers of this vision are wondering whether it is a dream, that is, it does not carry an interpretation, or whether it is one of the visions that indicate something worthy of praise or hatred for them, and we will discover in the encyclopedia what the dream interpreters said. About this vision. Interpretation of a dream about preparing food for guests. Dream interpreters have reported that the dreamer who receives visitors to his home in a dream shows his generous personality in reality. When a dreamer sees that he is preparing food for his guests in a dream, this is a sign of his marriage in reality, and God knows best. Seeing yourself preparing food for the guests and eating it completely It is one of the promising visions of the proximity of the Gulf and the collapse of worries. Seeing the dreamer entering the kitchen and starting to prepare food for his guests is a promising vision for achieving success and distinction in reality. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is preparing food for the guests and serving it to them without seeing them, then this vision is one of the promising visions for the return of the absent person. About his travels. Seeing yourself preparing food for guests in the kitchen also symbolizes kindness and nourishment, and is also an indication of the dreamer’s intelligent personality. Interpretation of seeing prepared food in a dream for single female guests. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried girl, it is an indication of her willingness to bear the responsibility of marriage. As for To cook good food for guests in a dream for an unmarried girl is one of the praiseworthy dreams that indicate achieving what she wants in reality, and it is also good news for her that she will find a suitable job opportunity in reality. This vision also portends the opportunity to travel for an unmarried girl, and God knows best. Preparing food for guests in a dream for a married woman. In general, seeing guests for a married woman symbolizes the fulfillment of desires in reality. Seeing preparing food in a dream for a married woman’s guests is one of the praiseworthy visions that express kindness and humanity. For her, she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. This vision for a married woman also expresses abundant livelihood, which is earning a lot of money in reality. In the event that you see yourself preparing food for guests in the kitchen, this vision expresses the stability of the dreamer’s psychological state, if the kitchen is organized. And clean, but if it is the opposite, it indicates the disturbance in his psychological state and the extent of sadness for her. As for seeing herself preparing food for the guests in her bedroom, this vision highlights the extent to which she actually aspires to become pregnant. Interpretation of preparing food for the guests in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for To see a pregnant woman in a dream preparing food for the guests, the meaning of this dream lies in the imminent date of her birth in reality. If the pregnant woman sees that she is preparing rice with meat for the guests, then this vision symbolizes the birth of a boy, but in the case of preparing soup, this vision

title: Interpretation of dreams about an explosion in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream. What does good or bad news mean?

preview.html: Many are searching for an interpretation of a dream about an explosion in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream, as the explosion in general is a source of concern for everyone because of the destruction and devastation it causes, and the Mosque in Mecca is one of the holy places that many fear any harm or harm, so many want to know the interpretations of this dream. The interpretation of a dream varies depending on many things, such as the psychological or social state of the dreamer, for example. For this reason, dear reader, we present to you in our article on the encyclopedia website the interpretation of a dream about an explosion in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream, whether for a single or married woman or for a woman. Others, in addition to mentioning many different interpretations in general, but it must be noted that all of these interpretations and sayings are merely speculations, and are personal opinions that have no basis in truth, meaning they should not be believed. Interpretation of a dream about an explosion in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream is trying Many interpreters and scholars interpret the different dreams that many people see, so all interpretations are considered personal judgments that may be right or wrong, and this is only in the hands of God Almighty and the interpretations of a dream about an explosion in the world. The Grand Mosque in Mecca differs. The appearance of any explosion in general causes anxiety in general, and if it is seen in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca, the dreamer feels fear and panic, not just anxiety, as the Sacred Mosque in Mecca is considered one of the most important holy places in which many people frequent. Fear of any harm or damage to it. Here is the interpretation of a dream about an explosion occurring in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream in general, as follows: It was said: The bombing of the Grand Mosque in Mecca is evidence of immorality, corruption, the spread of sins, and the abundance of sins and bad deeds, and evidence of the dreamer falling into sins and mistakes. It is said. Also, this explosion is a sign of the dreamer’s lack of faith, and this is a warning to the dreamer to return to God. The sky explosion in the Holy Mosque in Mecca is interpreted as an increase in prices and a deterioration in living conditions and the conditions of the country. As for the explosion that occurred in the courtyard of the Holy Mosque, it is a sign of approaching death. The ruler, ruler, or sultan. If a violent explosion occurs inside the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream, this is a sign of the spread of various disputes to a great extent. It is also said that seeing the Sacred Mosque exploding in a dream is evidence of the misfortunes and turmoil that the dreamer is suffering from. It is said that Hearing the sound of an explosion and seeing it in the Grand Mosque in Mecca is evidence of insecurity in general, but it also shows an increase in the level of fear. Interpretation of a dream of an explosion in the Grand Mosque of Mecca in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations of the dream vary according to the dreamer’s social status, and the interpretation is different if the dreamer is single and different if he is Married, pregnant, or even divorced, this is what makes everyone interested in determining his marital status while researching the interpretation of the dream. title: A detailed interpretation of a peacock in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a peacock in a dream and its meaning in detail. The strangest dreams are dreams about things that we do not think about and do not occupy our minds. The dream of a peacock is one of those dreams in which the dreamer does not know what this dream means to him and what are the hidden messages behind it, as it is one of the least common birds to see. In fact, it is one of the most beautiful birds because of its bright colors, as well as the distinctive shape of its wings. Which resemble propellers, so if you have had this dream before, you can in the encyclopedia see the interpretations of the senior interpretation. Scholars such as Ibn Sirin saw this bird. Interpretation of a peacock in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a peacock. Ibn Sirin mentioned various interpretations of this dream, among which is that this dream indicates committing immorality in reality. Seeing a male peacock in a dream indicates a foreign king, just as seeing a female peacock It indicates the presence of a beautiful woman in the dreamer’s life, and this vision also symbolizes the acquisition of a lot of money, and God knows best. If the color of the peacock is green or red, then this dream indicates good luck and prosperity for the dreamer. If we see a yellow peacock, this vision is repulsive and indicative. On illness. If a man sees a blue or black peacock, then this dream is one of the hateful dreams that indicates failure to achieve what the dreamer desires. Seeing a peacock entering the dreamer’s house means achieving goals and desires at work. If you see a peacock flying, this dream indicates To loss of opportunities in reality. Interpretation of seeing a peacock in a dream for a single woman. For an unmarried woman, seeing a peacock in a dream indicates the correctness of her choices and decisions in reality, and this dream indicates kindness and living, whether in her social or professional life. If an unmarried woman dreams that she has A peacock in her house, then this dream indicates marriage to a wealthy young man, and God knows best. If you see a peacock in an unmarried woman’s house in a dream, this vision expresses her meeting with one of the most important people in her life. If an unmarried woman sees a peacock in a dream and is afraid to approach him This means that she wants to achieve certain desires and seeks to obtain them, but she feels anxiety and fear. But if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that a peacock is walking towards her in a dream, this symbolizes her ambition and her search for success and prosperity. Seeing a peacock in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation scholars agree There is consensus that seeing a peacock in a dream for a married woman is a good vision for her and an indication of kindness and sustenance. Among the symbols of seeing a peacock in a dream for a married woman is that it indicates the stability of her marital life and indicates success and reconciliation. If a married woman sees herself playing with a peacock, this dream indicates that she You will hear happy news, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees in a dream that her child sees a peacock and is happy with this vision, this indicates good offspring. What is the interpretation of a peacock in a dream for a pregnant woman? In the case of a pregnant woman, seeing a peacock in a dream indicates kindness.
